channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- AMD Radeon Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- AMD Radeon Software

item.title: CVE-2020-12987|2024-09-17T01:02:07.506Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: A heap information leak/kernel pool address disclosure vulnerability in the AMD Graphics Driver for Windows 10 may lead to KASLR bypass.

item.title: CVE-2020-12900|2024-09-17T02:21:18.348Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: An arbitrary write vulnerability in the AMD Radeon Graphics Driver for Windows 10 potentially allows unprivileged users to gain Escalation of Privileges and cause Denial of Service.

item.title: CVE-2020-12982|2024-09-17T00:16:16.729Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: An invalid object pointer free vulnerability in the AMD Graphics Driver for Windows 10 may lead to escalation of privilege or denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2020-12905|2024-09-17T00:36:22.821Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: Out of Bounds Read in AMD Graphics Driver for Windows 10 in Escape 0x3004403 may lead to arbitrary information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2020-12901|2024-09-17T03:17:36.985Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: Arbitrary Free After Use in AMD Graphics Driver for Windows 10 may lead to KASLR bypass or information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2020-12980|2024-09-17T03:22:33.667Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: An out of bounds write and read vulnerability in the AMD Graphics Driver for Windows 10 may lead to escalation of privilege or denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2020-12898|2024-09-17T03:03:38.846Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: Stack Buffer Overflow in AMD Graphics Driver for Windows 10 may lead to escalation of privilege or denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2020-12929|2024-09-17T02:00:49.330Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: Improper parameters validation in some trusted applications of the PSP contained in the AMD Graphics Driver may allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions and achieve arbitrary code execution .

item.title: CVE-2020-12894|2024-09-17T01:45:55.094Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: Arbitrary Write in AMD Graphics Driver for Windows 10 in Escape 0x40010d may lead to arbitrary write to kernel memory or denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2020-12903|2024-09-17T00:52:24.174Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: Out of Bounds Write and Read in AMD Graphics Driver for Windows 10 in Escape 0x6002d03 may lead to escalation of privilege or denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2020-12983|2024-09-17T02:57:33.983Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: An out of bounds write vulnerability in the AMD Graphics Driver for Windows 10 may lead to escalation of privileges or denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2020-12960|2024-09-17T03:53:03.583Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20software
item.description: AMD Graphics Driver for Windows 10, amdfender.sys may improperly handle input validation on InputBuffer which may result in a denial of service (DoS).
